flowchart LR
    subgraph build_linux["Build Linux"]
        build_linux_step0["Compile"]
    end
    subgraph build_mac["Build Mac"]
        build_mac_step0["Compile"]
    end
    subgraph integration["Integration"]
        integration_step0["Test all"]
    end
    subgraph deploy_prod["Deploy Prod"]
        deploy_prod_step0["Deploy"]
    end
    subgraph deploy_stage["Deploy Stage"]
        deploy_stage_step0["Deploy"]
    end

    build_linux --> integration
    build_mac --> integration
    integration --> deploy_prod
    integration --> deploy_stage
